revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #26 Tamato |image = [[File:Tamato.png]] |caption = This Berry is large and spicy. When eaten during the cold season, it warms the body from inside. |growtime = 2h 24m 0s |harvest = 25 berries |replant = 20% |points = 625 |flavor =
*20 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} == Description == '''Tamato''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Razz]] with at least 1 [[Pomeg]]. The [[Razz]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 7 mins 10 secs || 23 mins 10 secs || 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs || 2 hours 24 mins - 4 hours 48 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TamatoTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TamatoTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TamatoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 2 hours 24 mins -
4 hours 48 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 1 hour 36 mins -
3 hours 12 mins || 20 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 1 hour 4 mins -
2 hours 8 mins || 13 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Tamato berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 60px;" | [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || style="width: 60px;" | [[File:Razz.png|30px]]

[[Razz]] |- | [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Pomeg.png|30px]]
[[Pomeg]] || [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Pomeg.png|30px]]
[[Pomeg]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] |- | [[File:Razz.png|30px]]

[[Razz]] || [[File:Pomeg.png|30px]]
[[Pomeg]] || [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Razz.png|30px]]
[[Razz]] || [[File:Pomeg.png|30px]]
[[Pomeg]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Pomeg]] || - || - || - |- | [[Razz]] || 4 mins 10 secs until ripe || 2 mins 47 secs until ripe || Not Practical |} {{Berries}}
